name: Gravtius (Juanjo Salvador)
description:
Gravitus is a retro-style platformer game, based on the possibility of invert the gravity. You have to explore the dungeon, get the diamonds, take the key, and open the doors to escape.

Controls
  • A move to left
  • D move to right
  • Space to invert the gravity

Music by Kevin MacLeod

Menu theme

Mellowtron by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4034-mellowtron
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Main theme

Jaunty Gumption by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3936-jaunty-gumption
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

End credits
